import React from 'react' import MyTitle from '../../../../Components/MyTitle/MyTitle' import ListItem from '../ListItem/ListItem' import './info.scss' const Info = () => { const titleStyles = { fontSize: '24px', lineHeight: '33px', letterSpacing: '0.03em', } if (window.innerWidth <= 1400) { titleStyles.fontSize = '20px' titleStyles.lineHeight = '28px' } return (
My data
    Statistics Compare
) } export default Info
